title: Delivery Driver
description:
Job Introduction

Get ready to embark on an exciting journey as part of our doughlightful team here at Pizza Hut Delivery. Strap in, hit the open road, and find joy in making hungry people happy. Yes, you heard it right - we'll pay you to cruise around in your very own mobile office, your car, all while enjoying your favorite tunes and delivering exceptional pizza.


What could be better than that? Independence, flexibility, grooving to good music, and indulging in great food - plus, tips! Sounds amazing, doesn't it? In addition to your infectious smile, boundless energy, and a reliable set of wheels, take a moment to discover what it's like to work here, delivering mouthwatering slices of the world's most-loved pizza to our beloved crustomers!

  


Main Responsibilities
Working with the latest, cutting-edge technology to ensure orders reach our crustomers in the quickest times. Hot and fresh delivery every time in partnership with the rest of the team in the hut to get things right the first time.


We like to keep things flexible, so you can work full-time or part-time, with a shift schedule that works around your life and your commitments. Working on getting your side hustle off the ground? That’s cool. Guest DJ’ing at your local? No problem. Or do you want to bag some extra hours to top up your holiday pot? If we’ve got ‘em, you can have ‘em!


It doesn’t stop here though. We have a world-class training programme so that you can progress your career with us from being cross-trained in our huts to developing your skills to be a Shift Leader or Restaurant General Manager and beyond!


Our world-class training will teach you everything you need to know to succeed on the job. Every new team member receives *awesome* training with us which you can access from your pocket, anytime, anywhere.

  


 The Ideal Candidate

You will need some skills from the get-go though so here's the low-down:


* A friendly personality and good communication skills. You’ll be the face of Pizza Hut at the front door.
* We provide state-of-the-art delivery technology to provide the best delivery experience, you may be required to have a smartphone depending on the franchise you work for.
* The ability to read maps and remember routes
* Safety is our priority. You'll also need a valid driver's license, insurance and reliable vehicle.
* Dress the part: We'll provide you with a uniform. We just ask that you keep it clean and come to work wearing it.
* Eligibility to live and work in the UK.

About The Company
**Bringing People Together with Pizza Hut's #JoyofPizza!**

With over 60 years of history, Pizza Hut has become the world's largest pizza company, with 18,000+ stores across 100 countries. We're proud to operate nearly 300 Pizza Hut Delivery outlets in the UK.


But wait, there's more to our pizza game! We've introduced amazing creations like the legendary Deep Pan, crave-worthy Stuffed Crust, and smile-inducing Cheesy Bites. Our latest mouth-watering innovation? The heart-melting MELTS. And guess what? We're not done yet. Stay tuned for cheesy surprises!


At Pizza Hut, our North Star is to be the top pizza choice, bringing people together through the joy of pizza. We're like the cheese that binds families, sparks reunions, and turns strangers into pizza pals. Slice by slice, we spread happiness and create lasting memories. Our legacy is cheesy, and we're passionate about delivering extraordinary experiences to our beloved customers and team members.


So, come on over and let us sprinkle some pizza magic into your life. Pizza dreams really do come true at Pizza Hut!


**Why Join Us? Our Recipe for Good**


At Pizza Hut, we're dedicated to expanding our business and elevating our brand to new heights by embracing the principles of "Good Growth." As experts in the pizza industry, we understand that setting clear objectives is vital to guide our delicious endeavours and bring about positive change. Without further delay, let us present our appetizing "Recipe For Good."


Our pizza-centric goals revolve around three key elements: More Equality, Less Carbon, and Better Packaging.

  


**Are you ready to rise? Let's make it happen!**


Package Description

Welcome to Pizza Hut, we make every single one of our craveable pizzas by hand. And we work even harder to help you handcraft your future. Exactly how you choose to.


We aim to create an exciting environment to help you get where you want to go in your personal life and work - a place to work together and grow as a team and a place that you call your own.


So, no matter who you are, or where you’re from, we want you at our table. We wholeheartedly believe in delivering an equitable slice for all, embracing, and celebrating the diversity that makes each of us unique. We take immense pride in cultivating a diverse team of individuals, where everyone can flourish, thrive, and advance alongside us. Our passion for diversity is exemplified through our collaboration with Hatch, as we jointly created the New Founders program to level the playing field and ensure equal opportunities for all. To learn more, visit: https://anequalsliceforeveryone.co.uk/


Don't just take our word for it; take a look at why some of our team members love to work here at Pizza Hut Delivery.


While we think we have a pretty great business, we know we wouldn’t be anywhere without the dedication of our hardworking team members. And we spend time celebrating that. It's not only crustomary to consistently recognise those team members who go above and beyond, but we love to share that success across our business through our team member awards.


So, no matter what your idea of success looks like, we’ll help you get there. So, you can rise to every occasion, every challenge, and every opportunity.

  


**Because, when you rise, we rise. So, what do you think? Are you ready to rise?**

Get ready to embark on an exciting journey as part of our doughlightful team here at Pizza Hut Delivery. Strap in, hit the open road, and find joy in making hungry people happy. Yes, you heard it right - we'll pay you to cruise around in your very own mobile office, your car, all while enjoying your favorite tunes and delivering exceptional pizza.


What could be better than that? Independence, flexibility, grooving to good music, and indulging in great food - plus, tips! Sounds amazing, doesn't it? In addition to your infectious smile, boundless energy, and a reliable set of wheels, take a moment to discover what it's like to work here, delivering mouthwatering slices of the world's most-loved pizza to our beloved crustomers!

Working with the latest, cutting-edge technology to ensure orders reach our crustomers in the quickest times. Hot and fresh delivery every time in partnership with the rest of the team in the hut to get things right the first time.


We like to keep things flexible, so you can work full-time or part-time, with a shift schedule that works around your life and your commitments. Working on getting your side hustle off the ground? That’s cool. Guest DJ’ing at your local? No problem. Or do you want to bag some extra hours to top up your holiday pot? If we’ve got ‘em, you can have ‘em!


It doesn’t stop here though. We have a world-class training programme so that you can progress your career with us from being cross-trained in our huts to developing your skills to be a Shift Leader or Restaurant General Manager and beyond!


Our world-class training will teach you everything you need to know to succeed on the job. Every new team member receives *awesome* training with us which you can access from your pocket, anytime, anywhere.

  


 The Ideal Candidate

You will need some skills from the get-go though so here's the low-down:


* A friendly personality and good communication skills. You’ll be the face of Pizza Hut at the front door.
* We provide state-of-the-art delivery technology to provide the best delivery experience, you may be required to have a smartphone depending on the franchise you work for.
* The ability to read maps and remember routes

**Bringing People Together with Pizza Hut's #JoyofPizza!**

With over 60 years of history, Pizza Hut has become the world's largest pizza company, with 18,000+ stores across 100 countries. We're proud to operate nearly 300 Pizza Hut Delivery outlets in the UK.


But wait, there's more to our pizza game! We've introduced amazing creations like the legendary Deep Pan, crave-worthy Stuffed Crust, and smile-inducing Cheesy Bites. Our latest mouth-watering innovation? The heart-melting MELTS. And guess what? We're not done yet. Stay tuned for cheesy surprises!


At Pizza Hut, our North Star is to be the top pizza choice, bringing people together through the joy of pizza. We're like the cheese that binds families, sparks reunions, and turns strangers into pizza pals. Slice by slice, we spread happiness and create lasting memories. Our legacy is cheesy, and we're passionate about delivering extraordinary experiences to our beloved customers and team members.


So, come on over and let us sprinkle some pizza magic into your life. Pizza dreams really do come true at Pizza Hut!


**Why Join Us? Our Recipe for Good**


At Pizza Hut, we're dedicated to expanding our business and elevating our brand to new heights by embracing the principles of "Good Growth." As experts in the pizza industry, we understand that setting clear objectives is vital to guide our delicious endeavours and bring about positive change. Without further delay, let us present our appetizing "Recipe For Good."


Our pizza-centric goals revolve around three key elements: More Equality, Less Carbon, and Better Packaging.

  


**Are you ready to rise? Let's make it happen!**


Package Description

Welcome to Pizza Hut, we make every single one of our craveable pizzas by hand. And we work even harder to help you handcraft your future. Exactly how you choose to.


We aim to create an exciting environment to help you get where you want to go in your personal life and work - a place to work together and grow as a team and a place that you call your own.


So, no matter who you are, or where you’re from, we want you at our table. We wholeheartedly believe in delivering an equitable slice for all, embracing, and celebrating the diversity that makes each of us unique. We take immense pride in cultivating a diverse team of individuals, where everyone can flourish, thrive, and advance alongside us. Our passion for diversity is exemplified through our collaboration with Hatch, as we jointly created the New Founders program to level the playing field and ensure equal opportunities for all. To learn more, visit: https://anequalsliceforeveryone.co.uk/


Don't just take our word for it; take a look at why some of our team members love to work here at Pizza Hut Delivery.


While we think we have a pretty great business, we know we wouldn’t be anywhere without the dedication of our hardworking team members. And we spend time celebrating that. It's not only crustomary to consistently recognise those team members who go above and beyond, but we love to share that success across our business through our team member awards.


So, no matter what your idea of success looks like, we’ll help you get there. So, you can rise to every occasion, every challenge, and every opportunity.

  


**Because, when you rise, we rise. So, what do you think? Are you ready to rise?**
